channel.title: [562] Fixing PvN/ Double Click on Npc [562]
channel.description:
I have searched everywhere, I even saw source downloads that has this fixed and they all say "Removed to much leechers" or whatever...
This is probably the only thing I have needed help with in a long time..
Where do I go to fix the PvN or double clicking on an npc to attack them?
PvN Aka: Range/Mage on an npc, you have to walk right up to their face and click twice.. :S
I'd appreciate if someone could help me :)
Edit: This is (RS2HD)
